mapper.select: SELECT mov.mov_no, mov_title, mov_titleEng, mov_director, mov_actor, mov_date, mov_posterURL, mov_state, mov_dday, mov_nation, mov_runtime, mov_intro, mov_rating, mov_genre, COUNT(lm.mov_no) as likeCnt FROM movie mov LEFT JOIN like_movie lm ON lm.mov_no = mov.mov_no WHERE mov.use_flag = 'Y' and mov.mov_no = #{mov_no}

SELECT rev.rev_no, m.mem_no, m.mem_name, m.mem_id, rev.rev_rating, rev.rev_content, DATE_FORMAT(rev.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i(%p)') AS reg_date FROM review rev JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = rev.mem_no WHERE rev.use_flag = 'Y' and rev.mov_no = #{mov_no} ORDER BY rev.reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( mem_no, mov_no, rev_rating, rev_content, reg_date ) VALUES( #{mem_no}, #{mov_no}, #{rev_rating}, #{rev_content}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM like_movie WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no} and mov_no = #{mov_no} and use_flag = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO like_movie( mem_no, mov_no, reg_date ) VALUES( #{mem_no}, #{mov_no}, now() )
